text: aur (isalie bhee) taaki jin logon ko (kutoobe samaavee ka) ilm ata hua hai vah jaan len ki ye (vahee) beshak tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se theek theek (naazil) hueehai phir (ye khyaal karake) is par vah log eemaan lae phir unake dil khuda ke saamane aajizee karen aur isamen to shak hee nahin ki jin logon ne eemaan kubool kiya unakee khuda seedhee raah tak pahuncha deta hai
